name: San Francisco
shortDescription: The tech hub of the world, known for its iconic Golden Gate Bridge, diverse culture, and innovative spirit.
fullDescription: San Francisco is a cultural, commercial, and financial center in Northern California. The city is known for its cool summers, fog, steep rolling hills, eclectic mix of architecture, and landmarks, including the Golden Gate Bridge, cable cars, Alcatraz, and Chinatown.

highlights.title: Tech Innovation Hub
highlights.description: Home to Silicon Valley giants and innovative startups, SF leads the world in technology and entrepreneurship.

highlights.title: Iconic Landmarks
highlights.description: The Golden Gate Bridge, Alcatraz Island, and cable cars are just a few of the city's world-famous attractions.

highlights.title: Diverse Neighborhoods
highlights.description: From the historic Chinatown to the trendy Mission District, each neighborhood offers unique character and culture.

faqs.question: What are the best areas to live in San Francisco?
faqs.answer: Popular areas include Pacific Heights for luxury homes, North Beach for Italian culture, the Mission for trendy dining, and Nob Hill for classic San Francisco charm.

faqs.question: How expensive is housing in San Francisco?
faqs.answer: San Francisco has one of the highest housing costs in the US, with median home prices around $1.8M. The competitive market reflects the city's desirability and limited space.

faqs.question: What is the job market like in San Francisco?
faqs.answer: SF has a strong job market, particularly in technology, finance, and healthcare. The city attracts top talent from around the world.

faqs.question: How is the public transportation in San Francisco?
faqs.answer: SF offers excellent public transportation including BART, Muni buses and light rail, and iconic cable cars. The city is also very walkable and bike-friendly.

clients.name: Alex Thompson
clients.review: Amazing experience buying in SOMA! The team's tech industry knowledge was invaluable in finding the perfect loft.

clients.name: Jennifer Liu
clients.review: Found a beautiful Victorian in Pacific Heights. The process was smooth and the market insights were spot-on.

clients.name: Michael Foster
clients.review: Excellent service for luxury property investment. Deep understanding of SF's unique market dynamics.
